Description.div:
Identifies the newly created batch for the cart build process
BatchNo passed should be a valid and of an open batch.

Attribute.Name: ContainerNo
Attribute.Description: The container number. This is a unique key or business key, which by itself identifies a delivery plan. If not passed as input, the system generates this number using the database sequence SEQ_YFS_CONTAINER_NO.

Attribute.Name: ShipmentContainerKey
Attribute.Description: Identifies the Container associated with the Batch.

Attribute.Name: ShipmentKey
Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_SHIPMENT table.

Attribute.Name: SourceZoneId
Attribute.Description: The Zone corresponding to the source location. Denormalized here for better performance.

Attribute.Name: ToteId
Attribute.Description: Tote Identifier.Forms unique key of this table in conjunction with NODE_KEY. Indicates the tote that has to be inducted.

Attribute.Name: LocationId
Attribute.Description: Identifies the cart location for a cart. The location is the logical location name of the cart location.
